name: Ego Finale
description:
What would happen if a mad developer gets angry that no one plays his games?

You will discover it. In this Metroidvania, this mad developer (it is me, surprise!) will abduct you to force you to play his Final Project in the course he had been regarding videogames.

Will you survive?

In beta 1 you will find

  • Random generated characters!
  • A lot of enemies from my previous games!
  • Two mid-bosses!
  • Two final bosses!
  • 18 incredible levels!
  • Powerups!
  • Collectibles!
  • 2D and 3D cinematics!
  • And a lot (and I mean a LOT) of crazy talk and self-promotion!!!!

Unfortunately, this game is too ambitious for a WebGL version.  So feel free to download it. It is FREE!!!!

The texts are in two languages: English and Spanish, but it is only voiced in Spanish.

Keyboard Controls
  • Motion: AWSD
  • Action: W
  • Run: Shift
  • Jump: Space
  • Fall: S
  • Aim: Arrows
  • Left-hand attack: Q
  • Right-hand Attack: Right Control
  • Menu / Pause: Esc
Gamepad Controls
  • Motion: Left Analog (Left Stick)
  • Action: Left Analog Up
  • Run: Left Bottom (Left Trigger)
  • Jump: Right Bottom (Right Trigger)
  • Fall: Left Analog Bottom
  • Aim: Right Analog (Right Stick)
  • Left-Hand Attack: Left Top  (Left Shoulder)
  • Right-hand attack: Right Top  (Right Shoulder)
  • Menu / Pause: Select
